attributes.action: To scientifically and honestly prove that CO2 caused by human lifestyle is the primary cause of global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The statements made by Al Gore in 'An  inconvenient truth' which was rebutted in 'The great global warming swindle' has left many people confused.  Gore says that human generated CO2 is the cause for global warming but his critics maintain that (1) the earth is going through a natural cycle of warming (2) That human generation of CO2 accounts for less than one percent of CO2 emissions (3)That there was no large rises inCO2 emissions during the 18th Century yet similar temperatures occurred (4) That rises in CO2 occur naturally 800-1000 years after periods of global warming and are not the cause (5)That during the greatest expansion of industry in the last century, CO2 emissions went DOWN
